title: Bonzi Wells | Ep 155 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
itunes:title: Bonzi Wells | Ep 155 | ALL THE SMOKE Full Episode | SHOWTIME Basketball
description:
Another can't miss ATS episode is here. The guys sit down with 12-year NBA vet Bonzi Wells to talk about his NBA career, including his 6-year run with the Portland Trail Blazers. Plus, he discusses his coaching career and opens up about suffering a heart attack in 2017.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
